N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7404.9 - Use of physical force and mechanical restraints

State Regulations
(a) The use of physical force and restraints
by staff shall be reasonable under the circumstances and in accordance with
applicable law. (b) Neither
physical force nor mechanical restraints shall be used for purposes of
discipline, punishment, or for the convenience of staff. (c) All staff and residents involved in a use
of force incident shall thereafter be evaluated by licensed health care
professionals and shall receive medical treatment if warranted. (d) All use of force incidents shall be
immediately entered into the appropriate logbook(s) and shall be fully
documented within 24 hours of the incident. Notes
